title: Get involved
content:
There are a number of ways in which you can support this project.

  1. Firstly, we invite you to share the project widely. You can also share the URL for an individual place on the map, like Lubya.
  2. Secondly, we would encourage you to support Visualizing Palestine by becoming a member.
  3. Finally, if you are interested to contribute to or support the project in any other way, just hit the contact link in the menu.
